text: deyako z prorokiv komu BOHA blahoslovlyaye. Vony buly vybrani z chysla nashchadkiv Adam, ta nashchadky tsykh komu my perevezly z Noah, ta nashchadky Abraham ta Izrayil聞, ta z chysla tsykh komu my kerovanykh ta obranykh. Koly apokalipsys naybil聞sh Dobrozychlyvoho deklamuyut聞sya yim, vony padayut聞 prostrate, weeping
